content: अद् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> [अत्ति, आद, --जघास, अघसत्, अत्स्यति, अत्तुं, अन्न, -जग्ध, जग्ध्वा] {@--1@} To eat, devour. {@--2@} To destroy. {@--3@} = अंद्, <ab>q. v.</ab> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To feed with, cause to eat; आदयत्यन्नं बटुना <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} जिघत्सति To wish to eat. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%edo%}, <ab>Gr.</ab> {%edo%}, <ab>Germ.</ab> {%essen%}, <ab>Eng.</ab> {%eat%}; Lith. {%edmi%}, Sans. {%admi%}, <ab>Goth.</ab> {%at%}, Zend {%ad%}]. With अव to satisfy by food, get rid of with feeding; (<ab>fig.</ab>) stop the mouth of. --आ to eat &c. --प्र --सं to use up, consume, devour; समदंत्यामिषं खगाः <ls>Bk. 18. 12.</ls> --वि to gnaw.
अद् --द {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Eating, devouring; मांसाद carnivorous, feeding on flesh; so मत्स्य°.
